Class Formula

java.lang.Object
com.calcgame.main.Formula
public class Formula extends Object
An object that represents a mathematical expression

    • andThen

      public Formula andThen(Function<org.python.core.PyComplex,org.python.core.PyComplex> f)
      Wraps this formula in a function and returns the resulting formula. Returns f(x), where this formula is x, and the function is f.
      Parameters:
      f - the function to wrap into
      Returns:
      the resulting formula

    • fromString

      public static Formula fromString(String s) throws Formula.InvalidFormulaException
      Parses a mathematical expression from a string without whitespace
      Parameters:
      s - the string to parse from
      Returns:
      the parsed formula
      Throws:
      Formula.InvalidFormulaException - if the string is not a valid mathematical expression
